content: **size** one size **measurements** radius 70 cm / 27 5 **materials** 1 cake of twister col 44 **hooks** crochet hook 3 mm d-3 **yarn quality** twister hobbii 55 % cotton 45 % acrylic 250 g / 8 8 oz = 1000 m / 1094 yds **gauge** 25 double_crochet x 10 row = 10 cm x 10 cm / 4 x 4 note wash and dry your sample before making measurements **pattern information** this semi-circular shawl is the ultimate one skein project simple yet incredibly satisfying to crochet the delicate lace pattern creates a beautiful lightweight fabric that drapes effortlessly making it flattering on every body type
